messages.subject: Re: classes from JSSC
messages.msgSnippet: Mark, Thank you very much. Darcy contacted me and all is well. I hope to purchase the book(s) that Darcy and Robert are co-authoring about the Bizen swords.
messages.messageBody:
Mark,

Thank you very much. Darcy contacted me and all is well. I hope to
purchase the book(s) that Darcy and Robert are co-authoring about the
Bizen swords. These books ought to be terrific.

Thanks again,

Elliott

messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] classes from JSSC
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Elliott,                   Welcome to the group!  Funny,  I asked this same question when I started with the group last year.  Please
messages.messageBody:
Hi Elliott,
                  Welcome to the group!  Funny,  I asked this same question
when I started with the group last year.  Please contact Darcy Brockbank at
HYPERLINK "http://www.nihonto.ca"www.nihonto.ca   He is extremely
knowledgeable and will gladly share his thoughts about Mr. Fimio.
Good luck on your trip SF.
 
Mark Jaillet
 

-----Original Message-----
From: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com [mailto:nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com]On
Behalf Of elliottshogun
Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2006 7:15 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] classes from JSSC



I just joined the JSSC. I am curious about the classes offered through
this club and Fred Fimio. I have a few of the books Fred has written
and really enjoy them. The classes are about learning Nihonto and there
are 3 - Novice, Intermediate, and the advanced is being written now.

Does anyone have any coments.....-.......

Thanks,

elliottshogun

messages.subject: classes from JSSC
messages.msgSnippet: I just joined the JSSC. I am curious about the classes offered through this club and Fred Fimio. I have a few of the books Fred has written and really enjoy
messages.messageBody:
I just joined the JSSC. I am curious about the classes offered through
this club and Fred Fimio. I have a few of the books Fred has written
and really enjoy them. The classes are about learning Nihonto and there
are 3 - Novice, Intermediate, and the advanced is being written now.

Does anyone have any coments............

Thanks,

elliottshogun
